Our village has lived peacefully for many generations. We had enough for living. Nothing to complain about.
Sometimes artists used to visit us to make us happy.
But the village has always survived, no matter what.
Kittaro, get ready, you must urgently deliver this message to the palace!
Grandpa, leave me alone, you are raving...
No time! Get ready I said!
What kind of prophecy? What the hell... okay, okay, I\'m coming...
Hey Kitty, where are you going? What are you hiding there?
Bashka, Buckwheat, Crutch, I did not expect to meet you here!
Anyway I have no time to chat with you, let me go...
Look, Kitty is rushing into battle, take him, boys!
The battle takes place on the field of hexagons.
Your character is a cell, as well as other characters.
Hexes are of different types, each type behaves differently.
Now only vital (green) hexes are available to you.
Each vital hex has a power equal to two.
Every turn, the cells approach the nearest enemy by one hex.
When cells collide the strength of neighboring enemy hexes compares.
The weaker hex dies and is removed from the cell.
The power corresponding to the strength of the dead hex is subtracted from the more powerful hex.
If the hex forces are equal, both die.
A cell dies if it has no vital hexes left.
Also the cell dies if the connection of the vital hexes is broken.
The fight ends when only cells belonging to the same group remain alive.

You get a reward for a battle you won - hexes and, sometimes, abilities.
Received hexes can be added to your cell, strengthening it.
You can rebuild a cell as you like, adding and removing hexes from it.
The main thing is not to break the connection between the vital hexes.
You have discovered a new type of hexes - attacking (red).
Attacking hexes do not have their own power.
They draw it from the hexes around them.
Each adjacent vital hex adds 1 to the force of the attacking hex.
Strengthen your cell and go on.
I\'ve never got so far away from home...
Skiloses?! I wonder who else can be found far from the settlements.

Damn, well, damned skilos patted me!
The next time I have to be more attentive and better to dodge.
Now you can set the behavior of cells (program it).
So that it responds to the situation in battle.
There are rules, conditions and actions.
One rule contains many conditions and one action.
If all conditions contained in the rule are fulfilled the action will be performed.
The cell contains a set of rules.
Each turn the cell goes through its rules one by one.
If for some rule ALL conditions are fulfilled,
Then the cell performs the action described in this rule and the search ends.
If none of the rules meets situation of battlefield, then nothing happens.
The priority of the rules can be changed by dragging and dropping them. Search goes from top to bottom.
To remove rule or condition you can swipe it left or right.
At this moment, you can check two conditions:
Direction to the nearest enemy - north, northeast, southeast, south, southwest, northwest
Distance to the nearest enemy - it might be from 0 to 9
At this moment, you can perform one action:
Turn in the indicated direction - north, northeast, southeast, south, southwest, northwest
Try to create a set of rules in which your cell will always be directed at the nearest enemy.

Gonato village, not so remote province
Greetings, traveler, where are you going?
To the capital?! That\'s far away... And where did you come from?
Fterna, you say?! I have a brother-in-law from Fterna, he owed me three sheep.
If you meet him, you tell him
Elder of Gonato does not forget his sheep, you\'ll tell him.
Since we are talking about sheep, will you help us?
You look quite belligerent, not like our peasants.
For a long time nothing bad happens to us, but the trouble.
Belos came to us, to steal sheep.
We would deal with him, but we\'re too busy,
and he is so terrible, ours are all afraid of him!
Actually, I\'m in a hurry, it\'s very important to get to the capital as quickly as possible.
I understand if you are in a hurry...
That\'s nice, nice, pleased the old man, thank you!
Well, your business, we are not offended... good luck to you on your journey!

What the beast! It almost devoured me!
I must tell the elder that the deed is done.
And with good news! Belos will not bother you again.
Here is a joy! Hey people, the beast is gone!
Well boy, well done! Tell you what, you won\'t go empty-handed.
And the best gift is knowledge. I have one book from my grandmother.
I\'m not good enough for all this writing, but my grandmother said,
that this book can teach you turn one hexes into others.
Take it, this is surely more useful to you than me.
Now you can turn some hexes into others and back.
Check the new button on the hero screen.

"{ id: 'cut_scene_analafro', background: 'ic_cs_analafro_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_analafro_0' }, '1': { text: 'cs_analafro_1', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_analafro_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '3': { text: 'cs_analafro_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '4': { text: 'cs_analafro_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal' }, '5': { text: 'cs_analafro_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal' }, '6': { text: 'cs_analafro_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '7': { text: 'cs_analafro_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal' }, '8': { text: 'cs_analafro_8', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal' }, '9': { text: 'cs_analafro_9', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_omikhli_speak' }, '10': { text: 'cs_analafro_10', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_omikhli' }, '11': { text: 'cs_analafro_11', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_omikhli_speak' }, '12': { text: 'cs_analafro_12', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal' }, '13': { text: 'cs_analafro_13', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal' }, '14': { text: 'cs_analafro_14', background: 'ic_cs_analafro_14' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneAnalafro_to_battleOmikhli' }"
Yeah, the weather is bad, the third day hanging this damn fog.
And every day he is thicker and thicker
You ask who is here, not even knowing where you are?
I am the great demon Omikhli, and who are you and what are you doing in my domain?
I am Kittaro and I need to get to the capital as soon as possible.
This will not happen, no one has yet passed through my lands without paying for it!

"{ id: 'cut_scene_after_omikhli', background: 'ic_cs_after_omikhli_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_0', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '1': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_1', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '3': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '4': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_4', background: 'ic_cs_after_omikhli_4' }, '5': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_5', background: 'ic_cs_after_omikhli_5', showPrevFrameButton: true }, '6': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_6', background: 'ic_cs_after_omikhli_6', showPrevFrameButton: true }, '7': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_7', background: 'ic_cs_after_omikhli_7', showPrevFrameButton: true }, '8': { text: 'cs_after_omikhli_8', background: 'ic_cs_after_omikhli_8', showPrevFrameButton: true } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneAfterOmikhli_to_heroScreenAfterOmikhli' }"
And there are caves, so all this time I was so close!
Bloody demon, wanted to confuse me
Okay, time to heal and move on
You discovered a new type of hexes - energy (yellow)
They have the power of 1, but most importantly, give power to the attacking hexes.
+2 each adjacent, and +1 each attacking located at distance of 2.
Vital hexes can not coexist with two or more energy ones.
Energy hexes can be used for linking life ones.

"{ id: 'cut_scene_kilia', background: 'ic_cs_kilia_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_kilia_0' }, '1': { text: 'cs_kilia_1', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_kilia_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '3': { text: 'cs_kilia_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '4': { text: 'cs_kilia_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '5': { text: 'cs_kilia_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '6': { text: 'cs_kilia_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '7': { text: 'cs_kilia_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '8': { text: 'cs_kilia_8', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '9': { text: 'cs_kilia_9', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '10': { text: 'cs_kilia_10', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '11': { text: 'cs_kilia_11', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '12': { text: 'cs_kilia_12', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '13': { text: 'cs_kilia_13', background: 'ic_cs_kilia_13' }, '14': { text: 'cs_kilia_14', background: 'ic_cs_kilia_14' }, '15': { text: 'cs_kilia_15', background: 'ic_cs_kilia_15' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneKilia_to_battleNikhteribs', gameStateChanges: { 'zoi_available': true } }"
Not at all, not at all. I am Zoi, and this is my abode.
Yes, we, the spirits, are often confused with them.
Gonna go with you on my last trip.
It is dark in the caves, take this torch. It is time.
Damn, it\'s really dark here, what\'s that squeak?
Oh, they\'ve always lived here, usually they are not very happy about guests...

"{ id: 'cut_scene_after_nikhteribs', background: 'ic_cs_after_nikhteribs_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_0', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '1': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_1', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '3': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '4': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '5': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '6': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '7': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '8': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_8', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '9': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_9', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '10': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_10', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '11': { text: 'cs_after_nikhteribs_11', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneAfterNikhteribs_to_heroScreenAfterNikhteribs' }"
There were so many of them! Where are they came from?
Evil is growing at the sunset of the world.
Zoi, can you make things clearer?
No, you see in the language of the spirits there is no directness inherent to your language.
Oh, well, let\'s go, we are close to the capital.
Do you mean to the former capital?
Oh... I did not expect the news spread so slowly.
You see, the capital was recently moved from Kardia.
So the royal castle is now even further?
Then we have to hurry. Forward!

"{ id: 'cut_scene_kardia', background: 'ic_cs_kardia_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_kardia_0' }, '1': { text: 'cs_kardia_1', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_kardia_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '3': { text: 'cs_kardia_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '4': { text: 'cs_kardia_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '5': { text: 'cs_kardia_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '6': { text: 'cs_kardia_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_drunkards_angry' }, '7': { text: 'cs_kardia_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_drunkards' }, '8': { text: 'cs_kardia_8', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_drunkards_angry' }, '9': { text: 'cs_kardia_9', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '10': { text: 'cs_kardia_10', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_drunkards_angry' }, '11': { text: 'cs_kardia_11', background: 'ic_cs_kardia_11' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneKardia_to_battleDrunkards' }"
Wow, you just look at these houses!
Local do not like strangers, especially those like us.
Hey, salagi, where did you come from?
From you provincials all misfortunes come!
There\'re just drunkards, let\'s go Kittaro.
Oh no, you won\'t go anywhere until you pay the royal fee!

"{ id: 'cut_scene_after_drunkards', background: 'ic_cs_kardia_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_0', left: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '1': { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_1', left: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_2', left: 'ic_character_zoi', right: 'ic_character_palmos_speak' }, '3': { text: { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_17', left: 'ic_character_palmos_speak', right: 'ic_character_aima' }, '18': { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_18', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_palmos_speak' }, '19': { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_19', left: 'ic_character_zoi', right: 'ic_character_palmos_speak' }, '20': { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_20', left: 'cs_after_drunkards_26', background: 'ic_cs_after_drunkards_26' }, '27': { text: 'cs_after_drunkards_27', background: 'ic_cs_after_drunkards_27' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneAfterDrunkards_to_heroScreenAfterDrunkards', gameStateChanges: { 'aima_available': true } }"
Gentlemen, if you do not stop drinking, you will die very soon.
Remember, the word "rum" and the word "death" mean the same thing to you.
Kittaro, Zoi! You have to hurry, the tension in the city is increasing.
Yes, how do everyone know that I need somewhere?
A couple of magic tricks, that\'s all.
Kittaro, meet the former court magician.
Yeah, you don\'t look well. I see rumors are confirmed ...
Too vague to draw any conclusions from them.
Well, in that case, let\'s go with us, such a magician like you would be useful to us.
I can\'t, I have too much to do, and there must be someone to keep order here!
Aima! It\'s too dangerous, I need you here!
I\'m sure you will cope with everything yourself, besides you said once
that the appearance of the spirit is an event that occurs once in a lifetime and such an experience cannot be missed.
There is no need to represent her to you, Zoi.
No. Since I am a spirit, I am almost omnipresent, which means that I know a lot and I know many.
I remember her as a girl, in those days it was still possible to walk and collect petalubas without fear in my domain...
Okay, okay, we know the story.
If the spirit does not stop in time, he will tell you his whole life, believe me.
Kittaro take these artifacts - these are Actines, I have just three of them, Ayma will explain how to use them.
Actines are hexes that can be placed anywhere in the cell.
If two actines from friendly cells come together at a distance of 10 or less,
there is a beam between them, hitting enemies by 5 units.

"{ id: 'cut_scene_laimo', background: 'ic_cs_laimo_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_laimo_0' }, '1': { text: 'cs_laimo_1', right: 'ic_character_katofi_ponu_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_laimo_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_katofi_ponu' }, '3': { text: 'cs_laimo_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_katofi_ponu_speak' }, '4': { text: 'cs_laimo_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_katofi_ponu' }, '5': { text: 'cs_laimo_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_katofi_ponu_speak' }, '6': { text: 'cs_laimo_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_katofi_ponu' }, '7': { text: 'cs_laimo_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_katofi_ponu_speak' }, '8': { text: 'cs_laimo_8', background: 'ic_cs_laimo_8' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneLaimo_to_battleKatofiPonu' }"
Laimo, a village near the capital
You should not be here, come back where you came from.
You what from a village or something?
Ah, well, I just need the king, can you guide me?
Rather, we are holding you back!

"{ id: 'cut_scene_after_katofi_ponu', background: 'ic_cs_laimo_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_0', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '1': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_1', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_aima_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_aima_speak' }, '3': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_aima' }, '4': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_aima_speak' }, '5': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_aima_speak' }, '6': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_aima' }, '7': { text: 'cs_after_katofi_ponu_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_aima' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneAfterKatofiPonu_to_heroScreenAfterKatofiPonu' }"
What was that, what did they shoot at us with?
It was petalubs activated by magic.
I did not know that they brought the research to the prototypes...
You know how to manage them.
Yes, it\'s simple, just like Actins.
Just hang them somewhere, and they will work themselves.
Well, go ahead, we are almost there!

"{ id: 'cut_scene_enkefalio', background: 'ic_cs_enkefalio_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_0' }, '1': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_1', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak' }, '3': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '4': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_zoi' }, '5': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '6': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_zoi_speak' }, '7': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_mage_speak' }, '8': { text: 'cs_enkefalio_8', background: 'ic_cs_enkefalio_8' } }, next_scene: 'action_cutSceneEnkefalio_to_battleEnkefalio' }"
The gate of the castle Enkefalio - the capital of the Empire
And here is the castle, finally...
Oh, I don\'t like those guys at the gate.
This is a court magician and elite guardsmen.
I told you to get out! Guard, kill these insolent!

"{ id: 'cut_scene_final_act', background: 'ic_cs_final_act_0', left: 'ic_character_empty', right: 'ic_character_empty', frames: { '0': { text: 'cs_final_act_0' }, '1': { text: 'cs_final_act_1', right: 'ic_character_king_speak' }, '2': { text: 'cs_final_act_2', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_king' }, '3': { text: 'cs_final_act_3', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal_speak', right: 'ic_character_king' }, '4': { text: 'cs_final_act_4', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_king_speak' }, '5': { text: 'cs_final_act_5', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_chronicler_speak' }, '6': { text: 'cs_final_act_6', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_king_speak' }, '7': { text: 'cs_final_act_7', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_chronicler_speak' }, '8': { text: 'cs_final_act_8', left: 'ic_character_kittaro_normal', right: 'ic_character_king_speak' }, '9': { text: 'cs_final_act_9', background: 'ic_cs_final_act_9', left: 'ic_character_chronicler_speak' } }, next_scene: 'mainFragment' }"
Who are you and what do you need?
Your Majesty, my name is Kittaro, I come from the village of Fterna, the province of Podi.
Our elder asked me to deliver this message to you.
What is there? Come on, I have no time for this!
